Texts.Chs: 当你解锁更多的配方，你会发现你的能力将会成倍增加。
Texts.Eng: As you unlock more blueprints, you will find your potential for death, destruction and protection will increase exponentially.

Texts.Chs: 想必你不需要我教你如何使用^orange;军备作坊^reset;吧！你可以在里面制作各类护甲与武器。首先让我们制作一个^orange;骨盾^reset;吧。
Texts.Eng: I'm sure you don't need to be told what your ^orange;Armorworks^reset; does!  The armor and weapons you can create here are varied. Let's test it out by building a ^orange;Bone Shield^reset;.
